summary: Canadian flyer Laurence Gerard finds that his wife has been murdered by a French collaborator. His quest for justice leads him to Switzerland and Argentina.
cast: Dick Powell|Walter Slezak|Micheline Cheirel|Nina Vale|Morris Carnovsky|Edgar Barrier|Steven Geray|Jack La Rue|Gregory Gaye|Luther Adler|Carlos Barbe|Paul Bradley|Egon Brecher|Beverly Bushe|Tanis Chandler|Martin Cichy|Richard Clarke|Ellen Corby|Gino Corrado|Jerry De Castro|Gloria De Guarda|Carl De Lora|Rod De Medici|Jean Del Val|Leslie Denison|Igor Dolgoruki|Frank Eldredge|Joaquin Elizondo|Byron Foulger|Herschel Graham|Warren Jackson|Cy Kendall|Nelson Leigh|Ethelreda Leopold|Jacques Lory|Kenneth MacDonald|Michael Mark|Louis Mercier|Frank Mills|Belle Mitchell|Hans Moebus|Al Murphy|Nestor Paiva|Stanley Price|Hugh Prosser|Waclaw Rekwart|Georges Renavent|Milton Wallace|Al Walton
title: Venganza
